description: dark blue semi-sheer silk with subtle pattern of medallions and floral sprays; black trim at neckline, slits on sides, bottom hem and front opening; square patch on chest embroidered with gold bird in blue clouds trimmed with gold in brown sky and red sun; gold key embroidery around edge of square; bright blue sleeve trim decorated with gold dragon embroidery; square embroidered patch on back with applique, with gold bird surrounded by blue, green and white flowers and foliage, with an orange beaded sun in ULC
title: Wedding jacket
